block.name: Ex: Burst Tagger
block.doc:
The burst tagger interpolates an end of burst tag \ onto a stream from a discontinous stream of samples.
A length tag embedded into the input sample stream \ tells the burst tagger block where to place the EOB tag.
This block is meant to be used after a modulator block: packet_framer -> modulator -> burst_tagger -> USRP Sink
The sps param is the modulator's samples per symbol.
